name: Flutter Butterfly [1] Blueprint
description: As human civilization dying gradually in the river of time, only the big mechanical guy in the debris and his friends remained.

name: Fly Wing
description: Fly wings can be cut off and made into magical objects that can move anywhere on a map.

name: Flying Angel
description: The beautiful head cover resembling the flying angel wings. Use it and the wearer will feel mentally and physically light although it may look a little bit active.

name: Flying Demon Wings
description: I will fly higher. - by the Demon who was ready to take off but found himself a backpack.

name: Flying Demon·Black
description: I will fly higher. - by the Demon who was ready to take off but found himself a backpack.

name: Flying Demon·Purple
description: I will fly higher. - by the Demon who was ready to take off but found himself a backpack.

name: Flying Demon·Red
description: I will fly higher. - by the Demon who was ready to take off but found himself a backpack.

name: Fondant Guardian
description: The defender made of fondant cake, a puppet coated with sugar. Once eating it, you will become a guard with a ranged deceleration ability. The effect lasts 5 minutes and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Fondant Hero
description: The warrior made of fondant cake, the soft cake coated with sugar. Once eating it, you will become an offensive warrior. Each auto attack deals 250 points of True Dmg, Atk.Sped is increased t 200%. The effect lasts 5 minutes and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Fooling Laser Gun
description: Shoot other players with this gun~ And they'll probably become stupid! (Use it on other players to turn them into giants or dwarves randomly)

name: For Alice
description: The lad found a small ancient wood box when he reorganized relics of his grandmother. The work that influenced later generations finally bathed in the sunlight again after several centuries. It's hard for people to know the true story, but the key in the young lad's hand imprinted a beautiful wish.

name: For Alice Blueprint
description: The lad found a small ancient wood box when he reorganized relics of his grandmother. The work that influenced later generations finally bathed in the sunlight again after several centuries. It's hard for people to know the true story, but the key in the young lad's hand imprinted a beautiful wish.

effect: Max HP ＋300,Job EXP of killing monsters ＋5%

name: Forbidden Gaze Box
description: Use it and get the Magic Dominator Abyss (male) or Lilith Earth (female) beauty contact lens from the Beauty of Eyes in Prontera.

name: Forest Crown[1]
description: The one chosen by the tree of Yggdrasil, the one chosen by Wenbala Rain Clan, the one chosen by Pixie. Wear this crown to become guardian of Yggdrasil.
effect: All Attributes ＋1,Damage taken from Plants and Brutes monsters －2%

name: Forest Hunter [1]
description: Equipment designed to fight in the forest does not affect the users' ability even if the terrain is complex, "it likes a part of my body. "- some old hunter.
effect: Critical ＋5, ＋5% Crit.Dmg at refining ＋5, ＋10% Crit.Dmg at refining ＋10, ＋10% [Deadly Snipe] damage at refining ＋15
